catentdesc.name: GECC Large Front Loading Washing Machine
catentdesc.shortdescription: Washing machine with a front loading system.
catentdesc.longdescription: Very efficient and environmentally friendly, Energy Star certified design. This washing machine will reduce your water bills and while taking less detergent. With front load system, the clothes will be cleaner while you save money. With a large capacity great for both commercial and residential use.

catentdesc.name: GECC Gas Stove and Oven with 6 Elements
catentdesc.shortdescription: Classic gas oven and stove with 6 stove elements.
catentdesc.longdescription: Ergonomically designed gas stove and oven with 6 stove elements which means less time to cook more dishes. High efficiency elements heat up quickly and make cooking easier and more enjoyable. You can also bake or broil with pre-programmed timing and heat settings in the oven without having to set up extra alarms. The large size makes it perfect for people who loves throwing parties.

catentdesc.name: GECC Large Fridge (Bottom Freezer Style)
catentdesc.shortdescription: Large fridge with tray style freezer at the bottom and refrigerator on the element.
catentdesc.longdescription: Modern style with tray style freezer at the bottom giving you maximum space and ease of use. Now you do not have to worry about items falling off when you open the freezer. And with nicely set compartments, this refrigerator is designed for easy usability along with cooling efficiency.

catentdesc.name: GECC Large Fridge (Side by Side Style)
catentdesc.shortdescription: Large fridge, side by side style with freezer on the left and refrigerator on the right.
catentdesc.longdescription: Designed for most convenient use and super fast cooling. Side by side doors make it easier to store items and requires less space to open the doors. Air flow is easily maintained in the fridge throw a high efficient top vent that cools down your food in minutes. It is also very energy efficient reducing your electricity bills.

catentdesc.name: GECC Gas Stove and Oven with 4 Elements
catentdesc.shortdescription: Classic gas oven and stove with 4 stove elements.
catentdesc.longdescription: Ergonomic design with well placed safety lights so you stay safe while cooking. Four stove elements with a large oven is perfect for the average sized family. Simple to use, with oven timers and alarms built in. This oven can start cooking supper for you wen you at still at work! Precise gas controls giving you more control on your cooking.

catentdesc.name: GECC Large Fridge (Element Freezer Style)
catentdesc.shortdescription: Large fridge with classic style, element freezer and bottom refrigerator.
catentdesc.longdescription: Classic refrigerator design, built to give maximum cooling efficiency and speed for all your food. Designed to make sure temperature is constant throughout the fridge. Highly durable, guaranteed to last 10 years without any issues.

catentdesc.name: GECC Front Loading Washing Machine
catentdesc.shortdescription: Washing machine with a front loading system.
catentdesc.longdescription: Energy Star certified design incorporating environmentally friendly technology. Very little wastage of water, therefore you do not have to worry about your bills, and also uses detergent very efficiently thus requiring less detergent. Front load design help clean your clothes thoroughly while you save money.

catentdesc.name: Finit High Power Blender
catentdesc.shortdescription: Multipurpose high power blender.
catentdesc.longdescription: High powered blender with six different settings that can be used to blend almost anything. You can use this to make juice, blend ice, make paste or powder. With different speed settings you have more control on finished product so that your cooking is perfect.

catentdesc.name: Finit Juicer Blender
catentdesc.shortdescription: Juicer Blender for making fresh juice.
catentdesc.longdescription: Finit Juicer Blender is perfect for making a fresh glass of juice whenever you want. With a jug design you make a glass of juice and drink it without and hassle within minutes.

catentdesc.name: Ritect Kinetic Blender
catentdesc.shortdescription: Blender for everyday kitchen purposes.
catentdesc.longdescription: Ritects finest blender! Kinetic delivers high performance to your everyday cooking. You can blend anything within seconds using the super speed on Kinetic blender. It has 5 speed setting and easy opening lid.

catentdesc.name: Finit Intreve 4 element Electrical Stove
catentdesc.shortdescription: Electric stove and oven with 4 stove elements and a flat polymer surface.
catentdesc.longdescription: The stove element is made from a highly durable polymer which makes cleaning after cooking as easy as cleaning a counter element. No more hassle of taking out coils to clean them. Light indicators tell you when the stove is hot and which stove is turned on as well. Oven is fully programmable.

catentdesc.name: Finit Rounds Medium Front Loading Washing Machine
catentdesc.shortdescription: Medium sized front load washing machine for household purpose.
catentdesc.longdescription: Front load washing machine with smart detergent intake compartments. You can fill the smart compartments for detergent, fabric softener and bleach once and use the washing machine many times. Set the size of the load and the washing machine decide how much detergent to deliver. No need to carry all the detergents and fabric softener every time, put them once and only worry about the dirty clothes.

catentdesc.name: Ritect KineticX Blender
catentdesc.shortdescription: Heavy duty blender for large quantity blending.
catentdesc.longdescription: This heavy duty version of Ritects blender can blend up to 5 litres at the same time. It will save you time and energy when you have a lot to blend. With 8 different speed settings you can put all you need to blend at once and leave it to blend while you do other things. Its a perfect kitchen appliance for large occasions.

catentdesc.name: Kitchenel OfficeServe Coffee Maker
catentdesc.shortdescription: A large coffee maker for the coffee lovers.
catentdesc.longdescription: With a 2 litre capacity this coffee maker is fitted with a grated funnel so that there is more coffee and less water in your coffee. Perfect for office environments and also the household with a lot of coffee lovers.

catentdesc.name: Get Up and Go CafeMan Coffee Maker
catentdesc.shortdescription: A coffee maker with a insulated flask.
catentdesc.longdescription: This coffee maker comes with an insulated flask so that you can carry take it with you as soon as the coffee is ready. Every office should have one of these. Inexpensive and durable.

catentdesc.name: Kitchenel SuperServe Coffee Maker
catentdesc.shortdescription: Kitchenel insulated coffee maker system.
catentdesc.longdescription: Kitchenel's element of the line coffee maker comes with an insulated flask and a setting to control the strength of the coffee. It is a high tech coffee maker for those who loves to go that much farther with the quality of their coffee.

catentdesc.name: Get Up and Go CoolCafe Coffee Maker (Ruby Red)
catentdesc.shortdescription: A coffee maker with style and a lot of colors.
catentdesc.longdescription: Get Up and Go's CoolCafe comes in variety of colors to suit the aesthetic needs of everybody. With a curvy compact structure it will fulfill your office needs or make your kitchen look prettier.

catentdesc.name: Get Up and Go CoolCafe Coffee Maker (Leafy Green)
catentdesc.shortdescription: A coffee maker with style and a lot of colors.
catentdesc.longdescription: Get Up and Go's CoolCafe comes in variety of colors to suit the aesthetic needs of everybody. With a curvy compact structure it will fulfill your office needs or make your kitchen look prettier.

catentdesc.longdescription: Get Up and Go's CoolCafe comes in variety of colors to suit the aesthetic needs of everybody. With a curvy compact structure it will fulfill your office needs or make your kitchen look prettier.

catentdesc.name: Get Up and Go CoolCafe Coffee Maker (Stone Gray)
catentdesc.shortdescription: A coffee maker with style and a lot of colors.
catentdesc.longdescription: Get Up and Go's CoolCafe comes in variety of colors to suit the aesthetic needs of everybody. With a curvy compact structure it will fulfill your office needs or make your kitchen look prettier.

catentdesc.name: Get Up and Go CoolCafe Premium Coffee Maker (Sterling Gold)
catentdesc.shortdescription: Stylish coffee maker that makes the perfect coffee from Get Up and Go.
catentdesc.longdescription: The Premium version of Get Up and Go CoolCafe lets you control the amount of coffee to make and lets you set timers so that you can wake up in the morning to the smell of your favorite coffee. The wide range of CoolCafe coffee makers makes this coffee maker so famous and unique.

catentdesc.name: Kitchenel StylePro Coffee Maker (Red)
catentdesc.shortdescription: Coffee maker from the designers table.
catentdesc.longdescription: Kitchenel StylePro coffee maker makes blending coffee more stylish. It comes in a variety of color each set with particular ambient lighting around the jug. It will make your kitchen or office look even cooler while you drink away your favorite cup of coffee.

catentdesc.name: Kitchenel StylePro Coffee Maker (Green)
catentdesc.shortdescription: Coffee maker from the designers table.
catentdesc.longdescription: Kitchenel StylePro coffee maker makes blending coffee more stylish. It comes in a variety of color each set with particular ambient lighting around the jug. It will make your kitchen or office look even cooler while you drink away your favorite cup of coffee.

catentdesc.name: Kitchenel StylePro Coffee Maker (Blue)
catentdesc.shortdescription: Coffee maker from the designers table.
catentdesc.longdescription: Kitchenel StylePro coffee maker makes blending coffee more stylish. It comes in a variety of color each set with particular ambient lighting around the jug. It will make your kitchen or office look even cooler while you drink away your favorite cup of coffee.

catentdesc.name: Get Up and Go CoolCafe Coffee Maker (Milky White)
catentdesc.shortdescription: A coffee maker with style and a lot of colors.
catentdesc.longdescription: Get Up and Go's CoolCafe comes in variety of colors to suit the aesthetic needs of everybody. With a curvy compact structure it will fulfill your office needs or make your kitchen look prettier.

catentdesc.name: Kitchenel Premium Coffee and Espresso Maker plus Grinder
catentdesc.shortdescription: All in one coffee and espresso maker with a coffee grinder.
catentdesc.longdescription: The premium coffee and espresso maker is designed for the true coffee connaisseur. It makes premium quality espresso by grinding the coffee inside the machine. You can also use the grinded coffee beans to make your own coffee inside this coffee maker. With 3 stations, one for keeping your coffee hot, one for making espresso and one for blending coffee, this is the perfect coffee maker for the people who has extra work at night and cannot get through without that espresso shot.

catentdesc.name: Kitchenel StylePro Espresso Maker (Red)
catentdesc.shortdescription: Espresso Maker that matches your kitchen design.
catentdesc.longdescription: StylePro Espresso Maker from Kitchenel can grind the coffee beans and make a cup of espresso without any fuss with its multiple options. You can choose not to grind the coffee beans and use pre-grinded beans as well. It has different settings that allow you to control the density and strength of your espresso shot. So you can have the perfect espresso even at home. It comes in a variety of colors to suit your need.

catentdesc.name: Kitchenel StylePro Espresso Maker (Blue)
catentdesc.shortdescription: Espresso Maker that matches your style.
catentdesc.longdescription: StylePro Espresso Maker from Kitchenel can grind the coffee beans and make a cup of espresso without any fuss with its multiple options. You can choose not to grind the coffee beans and use pre-grinded beans as well. It has different settings that allow you to control the density and strength of your espresso shot. So you can have the perfect espresso even at home. It comes in a variety of colors to suit your need.

catentdesc.shortdescription: Espresso Maker that matches your style.
catentdesc.longdescription: StylePro Espresso Maker from Kitchenel can grind the coffee beans and make a cup of espresso without any fuss with its multiple options. You can choose not to grind the coffee beans and use pre-grinded beans as well. It has different settings that allow you to control the density and strength of your espresso shot. catentdesc.name: ElectroMaid Swift Coffee Maker
catentdesc.shortdescription: A simple coffee maker that meets affordability and everyday needs.
catentdesc.longdescription: Swift is a very affordable coffee maker that works just as well as any other branded coffee maker, making the perfect cup of for you everyday. With a heated element it will keep your coffee hot for as long as you need it.

catentdesc.name: ElectroMaid MorningShot Grinder and Espresso Maker
catentdesc.shortdescription: A compact grinder and coffee maker from ElectroMaid.
catentdesc.longdescription: get Up and Go's CoolCafe comes in variety of colors to suit the aesthetic needs of everybody. With a curvy compact structure it will fulfill your office needs or make your kitchen look prettier. Designed to blend coffee together to give the best flavor to your espresso or the coffee.

catentdesc.name: ElectroMaid Pro Coffee Maker
catentdesc.shortdescription: A large coffee maker with insulated kettle.
catentdesc.longdescription: Pro Coffee Maker from ElectroMaid has a 3 litre kettle, while you can program the coffee maker to brew right amount of coffee for you and pour it into an insulated kettle. You can carry this kettle away from the heating element and your coffee will stay hot for hours. Make for the hard working office people who cannot afford to take too much break for brewing coffee.

catentdesc.name: Kitchenel Compact Coffee and Espresso Maker
catentdesc.shortdescription: A compact design for a multi function coffee maker.
catentdesc.longdescription: Very intuitively designed Compact Coffee and Espresso Maker from Kitchenel can make your coffee or espresso shot into the same kettle with a flick of a knob. Makes a perfect espresso from different option to choose from. The futuristic design will leave your guests marveling!

catentdesc.name: Kitchenel OfficePro Coffee Maker
catentdesc.shortdescription: Perfect compact coffee maker for the office.
catentdesc.longdescription: Compact bold design made for the kitchen in a typical office environment. Easy to use element load design, so anyone can brew coffee whenever its finished. With one of these you will never have to worry about making coffee yourself in the office every time.

catentdesc.name: Get Up and Go EspressoMagic Espresso and Coffee Maker
catentdesc.shortdescription: A coffee and espresso maker for the coffee lovers.
catentdesc.longdescription: EspressoMagic makes the perfect espresso whenever and however you need it. With 3 settings for normal, strong and extra strong espresso shot, you can feel energized instantly from a shot of espresso from the espresso magic. And a coffee maker will keep you going for the rest of the day as well.

catentdesc.name: Kitchenel ErgoCaf Coffee Maker
catentdesc.shortdescription: Coffee maker that looks fancy and works like a charm.
catentdesc.longdescription: With a separate jar to hold your coffee, now you do not have to worry about refilling your coffee maker for days. ErgoCaf from the world famous Kitchenel coffee maker lines brings you the latest technology in coffee making, where the coffee beans are pulled out of a jar and put onto a reusable filter without you having to do anything. Stress free coffee making lets you drink coffee without any hassle of making it.

catentdesc.name: Get Up and Go ProCaf Coffee and Espresso Maker
catentdesc.shortdescription: A compact espresso and coffee maker from Get Up and Go
catentdesc.longdescription: ProCaf can make coffee and espresso for you right from one outlet. This design does not need a huge space in your kitchen for that espresso and coffee maker, instead it uses a very sophisticated design to switch between coffee and espresso whenever you have a change in mind. Blends a savory shot of espresso to give you the energy you need to work even harder.

catentdesc.name: Get Up and Go CoolCafe Coffee Maker (Sterling Gold)
catentdesc.shortdescription: A stylish coffee maker offered in an array of colors.
catentdesc.longdescription: Get Up and Go's CoolCafe comes in variety of colors to suit the aesthetic needs of everybody. With a curvy compact structure it will fulfill your office needs or make your kitchen look prettier.
